headline: Cardinal Health price target raised to $255 from $245 at Morgan Stanley
summary: Morgan Stanley raised the firm’s price target on Cardinal Health (CAH) to $255 from $245 and keeps an Overweight rating on the shares. The risk reward for Cardinal Health has been updated following the company’s “strong” Q2 results, the analyst tells investors in a research note.Claim 50% Off TipRanks PremiumUnlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing tools for smarter, sharper decisions Stay ahead of the market with the latest news and analysis and maximize your portfolio's potential Pu

headline: 3 things this healthcare exec is aligned with the Trump admin. on
summary: Cardinal Health (CAH)CFO Aaron Alt sits down with Julie Hyman to speak more about the Trump administration's healthcare policies, especially as the Affordable Care Act (ACA, also known as Obamacare) subsidies expired at the end of 2025. Also catch Aaron Alt discuss the trends in healthcare demands as the American patient population continues to age. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

content.title: 3 things this healthcare exec is aligned with the Trump admin. on
content.description:
Cardinal Health (CAH)CFO Aaron Alt sits down with Julie Hyman to speak more about the Trump administration's healthcare policies, especially as the Affordable Care Act (ACA, also known as Obamacare) subsidies expired at the end of 2025.

Also catch Aaron Alt discuss the trends in healthcare demands as the American patient population continues to age.
